name: Hungy Pixel
description:
Unique of its kind, easy to learn, fast to play, it's an addictive game that challenges your "tapping" skills! That's right!

You just need to tap the screen to direct Pixel, follow your targets or change direction to avoid the border.

If you are looking for an old school game, without advanced special effects but only genuine fun, this is the game for you!

Be fast and catch as many pixels as you can!

HOW TO PLAY

• Tap to start and change direction
• Catch as many pixels as you can
• Discover Bonus Pixels and combo point
